name: Home - Introduction
headline: Hi, I’m Alexis. Nice to meet you.
text:
Currently living in my hometown of San Francisco, I’m a Senior Front–End Web Developer with a design degree, which isn’t as crazy as it may sound. I’ve been playing with the web since 1996, and have worked professionally in the web industry for over 8 years. I’ve built websites for a variety of companies and organizations—large and small—and now am focusing on building and architecting web software.

Tim Berners-Lee proposed the idea of the World Wide Web on my 6th birthday, so I like to think it was meant to be.
